tool_description: Workable, recruit people by creating beautiful job posts through an API
name: Workable
title: Workable

api_list.name: /candidates

parameters.name: candidate
parameters.description: Look at the example on the right hand side for all parameters

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The shortcode is a unique identifier for each jobs and can be seen by invoking  "/jobs"

utterances.utterance: Can you add a new candidate with the name John Doe and email john.doe@example.com to the job with shortcode dev2024?
Please create a candidate profile for Maria Lopez, who has 5 years of experience in marketing, for the job identified by the shortcode marketingLead.
I want to add a candidate named Ahmed Al-Farsi with a background in software engineering to the position with shortcode eng2023.
Could you register a new applicant, Emily Chen, who specializes in graphic design, for the job opening with shortcode gfxDesigner?
Add candidate Liam O'Connor with a resume highlighting his project management skills to the job with shortcode pmRole.
Please create a candidate entry for Sofia Rossi, an experienced data analyst, for the job identified by the shortcode dataAnalyst2024.
I need to add a candidate named Raj Patel with expertise in cybersecurity to the job with shortcode cyberSec.
Can you register a candidate called Anna Müller who is proficient in UX/UI design for the job with shortcode uxDesigner?
Add a new candidate, Carlos Silva, with a background in finance, to the job posting with shortcode financeManager.
Please create a candidate profile for Yuki Tanaka, who has experience in product management, for the job identified by the shortcode prodMgmt.
